- Your system permits full access to this storage.
- Your system permits read-only access to this storage. DOS applications cannot run from this disk, but you can still pick files like ISO or pictures.
Switch to second level and back.
Arrows. Move widget Up,Down,Left,Right or change it’s Height, Width. Depends on lever in middle of arrows.
Lever which commands arrows to do move or resize.
Select widget’s inner element. This can be text or image. You can change their size and position with arrows.
Align selected widgets to Top of first selected. Requires enabled multi-selection.
Align selected widgets to Left of first selected. Requires enabled multi-selection.
Set to all selected widgets the same Width like has the first selected. Requires enabled multi-selection.
Set to all selected widgets the same Height like has the first selected. Requires enabled multi-selection.

Set all selected widgets the same space in Horizontal direction like is between first and second selected. If only two widgets are selected, then they are aligned without space. Compared are left sides of both widgets. Requires enabled multi-selection.
The same like above, but in Vertical direction. Compared are top sides.
Set same values for multiple widgets. Requires enabled multi-selection.
Opens bag widget. This button is visible on second level when last selected widget is bag.
MT-32 requires these external (ROM) files : (MT32_CONTROL.ROM or CM32L_CONTROL.ROM) and (MT32_PCM.ROM or CM32L_PCM.ROM)
GUS requires external files placed on Drive C:\. You must specify their location.
Creates backup to local storage or/and shares it with other applications/services.
Magic Dosbox is an MS-DOS emulator. Please take a while and answer a few initial questions. This can improve your user experience.

Magic Dosbox offers two themes: Standard and Fantasy theme. Fantasy theme does not stick to common UI standards, and uses vibrant, more freely imagined icons and titles. Standard theme uses more common titles, and icons are painted according to Google's Material Design style.

Magic Dosbox is optimized for touch screen devices. But console systems (like <font color='#00ff00'>Android TV</font>) usually don't have touch screens. Fortunately, Magic Dosbox can be controlled with special blue cursor - controlled with analog stick on gamepad, if Console Mode is turned ON. 

Please turn ON Console Mode if you are on Android TV and similar devices.

Moving the analog stick controls the cursor position.

Use L1 and R1 for scrolling dialogs.

Use buttons X or A for click and button B for back button.

In game, hide and show cursor with 'Reserved button' - by default, this is set to L1.
Using System Cleaner applications is very dangerous and may lead to various data lost. Please add exception for cleaning process on the MagicBox folder, located on your internal storage.
Visit our website, youtube channel or facebook for video guides and forum.
<font color='#ffa500'>This setup can be again opened from settings or with START button on gamepad.</font>
